alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bennington and west central Windham Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bennington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennington, Stratton, Wilmington, North Bennington, Woodford, Old Bennington, Searsburg, Somerset, Medburyville, West Dover, Baker Field, Woodford State Park and South Shaftsbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
